name: Ragdoll executioner
description:
So this is a game, in that you can KILL guys :). You should try to make a wound in his head. You can take out in this game instead of real life! KILL the ragdoll for many different ways, you have knife, spear, pistol and cool basooca! Be original and choose your favourite method for killing. 

Kill like professional,

This is not optional!
